website_summaries.verdict: If you want to save money by doing your own laser hair removal treatments at home, this is the one to get. This series has been around for a few years and has just gotten better with each improvement.
pros: Tops competitors in terms of performance and effectiveness
Delivers nice results for most owners who use it as directed
Works especially well on dark, coarse hair
cons: Issues with the warranty being honored have been reported

customer_reviews.title: 60 DAY GUARANTEE NOT HONORED
customer_reviews.text: TRIA OFFERS A 60 DAY MONEY BACK SATISFACTION GUARANTEE, AMAZON ONLY OFFERS A 30 DAY RETURN WINDOW, BUYER BEWARE, IT'S CHEAPER THROUGH THE COMPANY AND THE GUARANTEE IS HONORED
customer_reviews.author: JEN

customer_reviews.title: Suffer from POS and can say this has saved my ...
customer_reviews.text: Suffer from POS and can say this has saved my facial hair problems. Yes it can be scary at first but the results are worth it. Does work!!!
customer_reviews.author: LmD88

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 10 months as directed. I purchased Tria to use on my facial/neck hair. I still have every hair and more after all this wasted time. I am truly disappointed in my purchase. It was a very expensive mistake. Buyer be very aware! By the time you realize the product does not work, you will not be able to return the laser.
customer_reviews.author: sjulie

customer_reviews.title: Time consuming. Laser eye is very small
customer_reviews.text: I thought more for your buck since there are many others much cheaper, but this isn't ideal if you want to treat large areas. The laser eye is small and you have to overlap your zaps, so to treat your legs will take hours to finish just the bottom section. The time spent treating your legs is actually very discouraging to keep using. Not to mention, it recommends to overlap a square inch at a time, and it can get confusing to keep track... so if you're going to use this def have a grid system. It's more practical for the face and underarms, but for almost 500?.... That's your call.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena De La Garza

customer_reviews.title: Machine was broken, error code after 1st use, common enough to have Youtube videos about it
customer_reviews.text: Was excited, opened up, unlocked, tested it out on some areas and was excited. A few days later, areas of skin looked fine, so i shaved the areas, dried and got ice packs out, was ready. Machine reads ERROR, and will not work. $500 machine and this is a common problem?? Garbage, trying to return/exchange now. Offices have very short and weird hours, how convenient /s
customer_reviews.author: Eric C. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Did not deliver results
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product did not work for me. I used it consistently on my arms and legs, with no results. I have light skin and dark hair. I have to assume that you have to have 5-o'clock shadow type of hair for this to work. I'm disappointed that I didn't return within the time period where I could've received a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia08

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Over 1 year later, I am still dealing with facial hair. This did not work!
customer_reviews.author: TeenDee

customer_reviews.title: Followed instructions meticulously. I really wanted this to work ...
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions meticulously. I really wanted this to work. The button on top to start and change strengths, the service dept said was broken, and apparently, this is a problem But, if it works, the laser exits through a tiny surface area. And, it covers a surface area of less than 1/2 " which you have to overlap with next area.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Russell

customer_reviews.title: Buyers remorse, I want a refund!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product faithfully, literally every 15 days, for the last 7 months, and I still have unwanted hair. It’s not finer. Or less noticeable. And I’m upset because it takes “at least” 6 months to see results, and I can’t send it back because that’s longer than amazons return policy. Very disappointed that this isn’t working for me. I thought I bought the best laser treatment machine on the market. $400 buyers remorse.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: I was hopeful but this does not work.
customer_reviews.text: The machine takes forever since the area it works on is so small and it doesnt work. I tried for over a month but did not notice a difference. When I get it done at the salon, I notice hairs falling out a couple weeks later but I dont notice that with this. I wanted this to work due to it being cheaper than the salon and laser hair removal but unfortunately it is not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and have used as directed for 3 months. It does not work and is a $400 paper weight as they will not allow it to be returned. I would not recommend despite all the other reviews posted that raved about how great it works for hair removal.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Driggers

customer_reviews.title: It works, it stings
customer_reviews.text: It does hurt. I bought lidocaine gel. That helps. I also died with charcoal dye. After 4 treatment (2months) I have bald spots on my calves, where before I had thick dark hair. I thought my chin was a lost cause because I’m 58 and have grey hair on my chin. Not sure if it’s the charcoal dye, but my chin hair is greatly reduced too. Which I only noticed after the third treatment when I realized I don’t wake up with chin stubble that I’m compelled to shave quickly before my husband kisses me. No more little dark hairs grow on my upper lip, non at all. And I was having to Shave them every day. I’m pleased
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: when professional services are not available this is it
customer_reviews.text: I've spent many hours and lots of money trying to control facial hair, yep it sucks but some of us have get to deal with this. I ended up out in the middle of nowhere and waited for years to finally break down and buy this. I admit it is not for everyone but it is definitely for me. Follow the directions for sure, don't think you can get by bc it really is the skin tone that unlocks the machine to do the job. Works best on pale skin with dark course hair. Just my two cents on this product. If you fit the criteria it probably will do what you want or at least minimize whats going on.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbee355

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product last summer and have used it as instructed, but have yet to see results. I was going to try and get my money back, but it turns out that the warranty is 90 days.. which is how long they say it will take to work. So by the time I realized it wasn’t going to work, my warranty was up. I’m really disappointed, I did my research and looked at reviews before buying the tria.. but now I am out $500 for a product that failed to give me results.
customer_reviews.author: Lmky

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS - Awful product
customer_reviews.text: I would give zero stars if I could. Please don't buy it. It DOES NOT work. It hurts to use. Very costly and I cant even return it now. Its too late for me but save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Mishra

customer_reviews.title: SUDDENLY STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this machine a handful of times since I bought it. I took it out of the box today to use it since I haven't in a while, and it doesn't even turn on. I plugged it in to charge for 4 hours, and even though it shows me that the battery is full, it won't turn on at all. I tried everything; I went through the troubleshooting on the Tria website and everything. I'm extremely disappointed with this product; it's basically brand new and I've taken care of it, so I'm not sure why it isn't working anymore. The worst part is that it's too late to return or exchange; what a waste of my money!
customer_reviews.author: Bina

customer_reviews.title: Easily tips over and will not be covered under warranty
customer_reviews.text: After only a few uses, the top heavy device tipped over on the counter and the screen broke. Tria will not repair the device, even at my expense and will not replace because they say they are not at fault for the fall. Be aware that it is very top heavy and prone to tipping over!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dolezal

customer_reviews.title: No pain no gain
customer_reviews.text: Dear baby Jesus this thing hurts. But it works. 3-4 sessions and I’m hairless below the neck....they say not to use for a Brazilian but it definitely works there too. Lidocaine gel helps a lot. Get some and follow the instructions. Follow the Tria instructions too! I’m a chocolate brunette w black body hair on fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to set up initially. I finally got the thing working and it only lasted 2 very brief sessions (2 weeks apart) before it quit and kept giving an error signal. Tried everything, left it alone for a few days tried again, it still wouldn't work. It's bulky and has a super small treatment surface. I ordered a second one from a different company after returning the Tria and it was SO much easier to use, for less than half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Lexus C.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about two months ago and wanted to wait for results until I left a review. WELL >>>>>> I must say the people on here leaving negative reviews must be from competitors trying to knock down this product. Why do I say that? Well, because I have used this thing only 3x sometimes and I have absolutely NO MORE HAIR growing in the location that I used it on. I am of beige skin color with black hair and this thing worked exceptionally well. I was skeptical at first because of the cost, but I promise you that unequivocally this thing works. You will not be dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A.

customer_reviews.title: didn’t last a year!!!
customer_reviews.text: This actually works very well!! I was skeptical but not to worry! It was about a month before I saw a real difference because I used the lowest setting—but after increasing levels I saw only a few very thin hairs **update** Seems the charger is not charging the unit! It always blinks in blue then just shuts off! Lasted only about a year—because I noticed the charging issue before thanksgiving. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rigs

customer_reviews.title: Hoped for better results
customer_reviews.text: The number one reason I bought this because I have PCOS, I had professional laser done years ago and didn’t have good results so I thought I would give this a try. I have tried this every week since March on my stomach, face , and bikini area on level 4/5 and I would say the hair definitely has slowed in growth , but it is not shedding or gone like I hoped for . I’m going to continue use but hoped this would Work better .
customer_reviews.author: K. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of expletive. I have dark hair; pale skin, used every 2 weeks as directed with 0% hair reduction. Pay the money for professional LHR, not IPL or this “ diode” laser that doesn’t have a gauge big enough to remove coarse hair. I should have returned this as soon as I say the area supposedly able to be treated was less than a dime. Seriously, see a cosmetic dermatologist/ aesthetic medical clinic. I’m mad as...
customer_reviews.author: Elyse M Kleidon

customer_reviews.title: A Dud!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pale skinned woman with dark brown hair. In other words, the perfect candidate for hair removal. The "laser" does nothing but give a discordant buzz when I place it on my skin. It's maybe fired a total of 5 times with no results. A dud. If I could give it zero stars, I would. Please don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for Facial Hair
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely works wonders, even for someone who is really hairy like myself. I have had a hairy face for as long as I can remember. Waxing and tweezing made me break out. With this product you need to shave before using it and shaving is a great exfoliating tool for the face. Shaving my face and using this machine has made my face so smooth. I have using it for a month and I can see a huge difference. Less hair that grows back thinner after each use. Thank you tria for giving flawless skin that I have only dreamed of.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Tria for about a month. I’m specifically using it on my armpits (to start) and I’m definitely seeing a difference! It’s a little on the heavy side, which is my reason for 4 stars), but for laser hair removal at home, I’ll deal with it!!! I’m using it a little more often than suggested (once a week).
customer_reviews.author: Tonya K. Brunton

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price....not effective at all. Save you money.
customer_reviews.text: Not effective at all. Paid too much money not to c results.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: What’s the problem
customer_reviews.text: I can not power on the device, it only starts a count by pressing it
customer_reviews.author: Rafael de Souza Horacio

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: Pros- Quick flash time Cons- Painful - Tiny treatment window - Got am error message after just a few uses, now it does not work... Will try to return, maybe exchange for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: D B Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, IPL is a better, cheaper, and more effective choice.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. Have been using it for several months on legs and armpits. Have done probably 12 treatment cycles with no noticeable results. I have dark brown hair with black follicles. Don't waste your money! Buy a cheaper hair removal system with IPL technology. Time-tested, tried and true, multiple lower intensity treatments are more effective than a single high-intensity treatment. I guess I'm partially at fault for believing the fancy advertising tactics and exciting word use.
customer_reviews.author: LovePreMed

customer_reviews.title: It works, it hurts, it's worth it if you're serious
customer_reviews.text: Read and follow the directions closely. Yes it takes forever. Yes you need to recharge it after like 20-30 min. But it works. In fairness, I've been doing IPL for a few months and it was good for sure, but this knocked out lots more hair, made some thinner, etc. Finishing just my second use, but I'm really happy with the results. Give it a shot if you're serious about hair removal. If it's not a big deal for you it might not be worth it, but it's been worth it for me. Update: After 3rd use, hair growth is super slow! Still going to do more, but finally close to where I want it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shoshana

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, this laser made me grow MORE hair than I had before I started using it. Thats not to say it's not a good laser, this laser type just didnt work for me personally which is a risk taken with any laser. It was easy to hold and use and the battery life was satisfactory. Unfortunately it took longer than 30 days for me to realise that it was doing more harm than good and now it's in my bathroom cupboard not being utilized. It's an expensive risk and a purchase that I would not make again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: It works but not instantly. You need to be ...
customer_reviews.text: It works but not instantly. You need to be patient. I use it once a week and have seen definite results. Less and thinner hair after only three uses. I have dark hair and light skin so that may be why it's so effective for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morlote

customer_reviews.title: Very happy I purchased it! Hair free by Spring!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but temper your expectations. It takes months for it to work. I am happy to report.... it is working! Use it every other week. Use setting 4/5 (5/5 burns) and I am slowly shaving less!!! I use it on my armpits and legs and I’m impressed. It’s pricey but cheaper than going to the salon. Yes, it takes about 90 minutes to do all my body areas but that is again less time than driving to a salon for the same service. The only fallback is the battery, I have to charge after both legs. It’s quick to charge but if the battery lasted longer it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M&S

customer_reviews.title: I'm very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have light skin and dark hair so I am definitely a good candidate for this product. I have used it for about a month now and I am impressed. I wasn't expecting the results to be as good as they are especially since I have used every hair removall system known to man already with not so good results. I have used this on a few areas of my body and have had minimal hair regrowth. Each use has left less and less hair. I would recommend this product without hesitation. Easy to use and considering how much hair removal products and spa visits cost; it is actually a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It decreases hair growth but it does not completely clean all hair.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 10 months ago started to use. it works better for thick hair but it does not work for thin hair, like facial hair. You can decrease the thickness and number of your hair but in 4 or 5 months they come back. I am happy with this product because it weakens hair but it does not clean all of them. While buying this product just know that you are going to continue using TRIA. You can not finish all the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Seyma Tas

customer_reviews.title: Life changing and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had problems with hair on my chin since puberty (I’m 35 now) I ordered this in May 2019 and already I have so much more self confidence. I would shave in the morning and have stubble by the afternoon. I’m not all the way done with it but the change I have already noticed makes my life so much better and I can’t wait to see the end result. I definitely recommend trying it. It does hurt a little but I suck it up and have been on level 4. So worth the money !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really does work
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I am sorry about is that I wish I would have gotten the Tria a lot sooner. I was sick of going to a dermatologist and paying several hundred dollars per visit for almost the same thing. I’m amazed. It really works. I hope it doesn’t break, but I’ve gotten my money’s worth already.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Purchase through Tria
customer_reviews.text: I've had this item for 2 months and it WORKS. Unfortunately, my Tria fell off the counter and broke. Since I bought it through Amazon, there's not a lot I can do (it's past the 60 days). I'm now buying ANOTHER one..this time through Tria--which is cheaper AND comes with a 1-year warranty. I recommend you do the same!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Works on Brazilian area!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 6 weeks and use it on my Brazilian area/armpits on lvl.1 or 2 each week. There's about a 90% reduction in the Brazilian area already.
customer_reviews.author: XxBarakudaxX

customer_reviews.title: It really does work! Well!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the single most greatest purchase I have EVER made. I have Legit already seen at least 70% decrease in hair growth. I’ve been using the tria for only 5 weeks now, using it once a week on a 5 (highest setting) and using it only on my neck and chin area (ya I have a lot of black coarse in all the wrong places) Anyway, this product really works! No More plucking or shaving or having to cover everything up with a ton of makeup. My review is falling apart because I’m bored with writing. BUT. BUY.THIS.PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Btookie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life but works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Battery may last 20 minutes if that and that’s charged over night. It does however work. I shaved both arms and done only one. My right arm ( untreated) has grown back thick black hair like normal. My left that’s treated has grown back very very slowly and very light in color and some places haven’t grown back. I did return mine because the surgery I was having is canceled. But it’s a good machine to have and it does work. But battery sucks bad.
customer_reviews.author: Enixam

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair skin and very thick, dark hair, so I am an ideal candidate for this product. With that said, this product is definitely working. It CAN be painful, however after a little bit if time I have grown to WANT to feel a painful sensation because then I know it's targeting the follicle. I have remarkably reduced hair growth in just a month's time! Thus far - worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work! I had laser hair removal.and was only usi g this to touch up a few strays. It hasn't done ANYTHING! TOTAL RIP-off.
customer_reviews.author: LKB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I must on this product. I have tried everything to help with razor burn and red bumps. Lotions, creams, shave gels, different razors and medications! Nothing worked for me! I have been using the laser for 8 weeks, AND I LOVE IT!! It really does work. Already, I am noticing less growth and zero irritation. I am so thankful that I invested the money in this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It konks out after 15 -30 minutes or alproximately 330 ...
customer_reviews.text: It konks out after 15 -30 minutes or alproximately 330 pulses. The delivery window is entirely too small, and it takes 3 hours to charge back up. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It takes time.
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t feel like I could give a review yet. I have done 3 treatments so far and from looking at other reviews it looks like it take 6 months to a year to achieve lasting results. It stings quite a bit and is pretty time consuming but if it gives permanent results it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: It actually works well, you just have to do it a couple times and then follow up with maintenance treatment sessions. I have had professional hair removal and this works almost as good.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: Buy the numbing cream (uber numb is what I got, apply generously and cover area in plastic wrap 30 min) and use an ice compress for 30-60 seconds to further numb and help with any heat from the laser. It’s perfect and does what hair removal professionally does in the comfort of your home. You get to control the pain level and do touch ups whenever you want. I’m still wondering if it helps with sun spots as it targets dark pigmentation? We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: BMoor

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this as directed since November and haven’t seen any change in hair growth on legs, bikini line, underarms, or upper lip. I’m very disappointed as I thought I would at least some improvement. I reread the instructions multiple times and am following them exactly. Don’t waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Save your $ it’s a scam
customer_reviews.text: Ladies, please save your $$. After two months I still have to shave every day. I have used this religiously! I have fair skin and dark hair. It does not work! Ugh, I am sooooo disappointed! Guess I will get professional laser hair removal, crappy Tria!
customer_reviews.author: chalaina

customer_reviews.title: It truly does work.
customer_reviews.text: It really does work. Im so beyond happy. You do need to stick to a regimented schedule but you will see noticeable results after your first 2-3 sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Grimmmer

customer_reviews.title: It's not instant. But it really works for me.
customer_reviews.text: It's not instantaneous. It takes time. It really hurts at first. But it works and trust me, it was all worth it. 😍 It took me 6 months to see the difference. I used it every 2 weeks. I started at level 1 then now I'm on level 3 or 4. Thank you Triabeauty. 🙂 I love it. 😍
customer_reviews.author: Flevelyn Bodlovic

customer_reviews.title: Definitely don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I have very pale skin and dark brown hair and used this regularly on the highest setting for 10+ weeks on my stomach and underarms. I saw no reduction in hair growth at all. They say you need to use it for 6-8 weeks to see the effects, but the return window is only 30 days, so if it doesn't work you're stuck with it. I've had extremely successful professional laser hair removal, and bought this to save money and avoid having to go to a salon. An expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. I have been using it for months now. Mainly on my legs. It has decreased the hair dramatically. I still do touch-ups and all the hair is not gone but its way better.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Sparkman

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was on a search for something that actually works, I researched this product for 3 years on and off, for me I was not wanting to spend the money on another product that did not work. I finally gave in and bought it, I don't know why I waited so long to get it, not I have no worries or embarrassment.
customer_reviews.author: Summer De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Kills hair pretty good. I'm pretty fair and my hair is rather dark. My leg hair is sparse already so two sessions almost eliminated it.my put hair is pretty thick but after four sessions it's about a third less hairy. It will make the hairs come back thinner and lighter. But u must use the highest setting. Avoid tattoos. It causes boils
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Short life, doesn't do the job.
customer_reviews.text: I bought in January. It stopped unlocking first part of March. I am basically left with ingrown hairs. I would not recommend this product for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cathy dobbs

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works, and is comparable to in-office treatments. If you have a low pain tolerance, I’d recommend using the lower settings, though results may taken but longer. I saw inhibited growth by the third use. The only thing is, if you stop using it, it seems that eventually your hair will grow back.
customer_reviews.author: infinity24

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because i didint see any difference in the two months ive been using it. I used it every week. I have fair skin and black hair. Pain was incredible, i found if you wanna lower the pain, use an ice pack to ice spots before. Nothing else helped. I believe that this product would work if you used it for months and months sadly i didint know for sure so i had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Ausra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive areas!
customer_reviews.text: I have had professional laser hair removal and this product works just as well. It’s worth every penny. I’ve only used it a few times and have noticed a significant change. Easy to hold and use. The only thing I’m not a fan of is the fan that turns on to cool the machine. It’s always at different times due to heat and it startles me. Lol
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: bummer
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say and give all high stars but in truth, it doesn't remove hair forever :( I tried for a very long time and after a yr I gave up - it was so expensive :( I'm sad about this
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Hair coming back coarser
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why it doesn’t seem to be working for me at all.. my hairs are coming back coarser than before! & I’ve already done laser hair removal on my whole body I thought I could just use this for maintenance but it doesn’t seem to be working. Can someone help??
customer_reviews.author: Zein Ak

customer_reviews.title: White skin with dark hair so works well
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and I think it is going to be good. I have had laser treatment done in a clinic and I know how painful it is and this is the same which is telling me that it is working. I love the fact that I can do it in my private home.
customer_reviews.author: asgilmour

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work. I have contacted Tria after the 30 day Amazon return window to question the Tria 90 return window. Tria refuses to except the return of this product because I didn't buy it from them. Whats the difference. I think all 4 and 5 star reviews on this product are paid people from Tria or robots with no actual body hair. Don't waste your time or money because you will never get it back.
customer_reviews.author: charvey

customer_reviews.title: HURTS LIKE A MOTHER
customer_reviews.text: this is super painful and i have yet to see any results. i guess i am a masochist because i keep trying. its too late to return so i will have to continue using.
customer_reviews.author: Eric W & Gisselle

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works! Recommend
customer_reviews.text: So happy I purchased this! Couldn't get threaded or waxed during quarantine but now that I used this I won't even need to go back to that anymore! Love this! Works! Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HURTS! And didn’t work. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is so ridiculous for this price! It didn’t do anything and it hurts SO bad. Hard to use. Small window so it takes forever to do an area. It hurts SO bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Christine

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be ware. Error problem noted on internet
customer_reviews.text: Only used couple months and defective with error message. Tria refuses to accept Amazons receipt of purchase. What can I do?
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Sher

customer_reviews.title: I am stuck with this very expensive broken piece, ...
customer_reviews.text: I am stuck with this very expensive broken piece, out of the Warranty period. The company refuses to repair it or sell me a refurbished one or offer any discount on a new one. This is not what I expected on a $400+ gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Walzen

customer_reviews.title: Not working and too expensive
customer_reviews.text: It is not working at home. After I activate it on the website and waited for two days. The machine still doesn’t work. It is very frustrating and a waste of time. And also it is 200 dollars more expensive than the official website.
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty easy to use alright. I brought this for my bikini line. My skin tone is pretty light( hourglass porcelain) , but it still hurts when I laser there.
customer_reviews.author: liilyzhu

customer_reviews.title: Yes it will remove hair permanently
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried multiple permanent hair removal devices, this one is the only one that works. All others were not quite powerful enough. It does take multiple Sessions and it would be nice if it was a little more powerful
customer_reviews.author: Dark lord

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife as she asked me to. It’s amazing and over time, has dramatic effects and outcomes. A must have.
customer_reviews.author: Not Public

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a month and a half. I used it on my neck, chin, mustache and arms. I'm amazed! Facial hair is next to gone. Arms are taking longer but I see a good difference. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Z.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Battery goes quick but not too quick. It works great and I see a reduction in hair.
customer_reviews.author: Spacejunkie

customer_reviews.title: Best IPL
customer_reviews.text: Works great when using it regularly. Very portable and battery life is good. 4 stars because the area of use is very little but god for face. Also use safety glasses
customer_reviews.author: Alma L.

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold! Very effective! Sucky battery life but I don’t mind!l because it works.
customer_reviews.author: Delsy L. Tase

customer_reviews.title: Love the results I’m getting so fast
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been amazing. It’s a lot of money to spend, but I feel like it is 100% worth it. For sure get the numbing gel, nothing is painless lol
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Not works !!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m trying from 6 months but not worth for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sagar Taneja

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: does not work and if it does very little effect for us
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Good product even is little expensive the product have a great quality and work perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kilo180192

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for small facial hair or small areas of hair. It does work just very time consuming if you want to do like legs.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I had low hope when I got this, but it really works, specially you stick to a routine. I just hopped this would cover more area per zap
customer_reviews.author: laily sarvarian

customer_reviews.title: Used item, pubic hair
customer_reviews.text: Received this item USED and there was pubic hair in the package. Amazon would not extend return window despite me traveling and being out of state for over a month and needing an extension.
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: Fully examine this before use, found safety to be defective on the 1st one shipped
customer_reviews.text: Out of packaging safety feature was broken, display would not turn on, then would flash and select level 1... getting a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: it takes time .. but it works and it beats going to a proffesional and spending 300 or more each session
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Nada
customer_reviews.text: It did not work like it did at a hair laser clinic It didn’t remove hair
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Works great DEFINITELY need to be consistent overall worth the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: It wouldn't even turn on.
customer_reviews.text: After charging and activating the Tria 4X it wouldn't even turn on so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Gasswint

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be activated first
customer_reviews.text: In order to use the product it must be activated first. Will update with results.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleem

customer_reviews.title: Slow & steady!
customer_reviews.text: You may not see the effects immediately, but it works. Give it 6-7 months to see the reduced hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: JayBee

customer_reviews.title: How does this work?
customer_reviews.text: I cannot get this to work, sometimes it dies, sometimes it doesn't. I wouldn't buy again. I don't think it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Burkholder

customer_reviews.title: device malfunction
customer_reviews.text: the device does not show any color selection and no flashes
customer_reviews.author: Renad Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: IT DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: it does not work and super painful... I want my money back :(((
customer_reviews.author: mina

customer_reviews.title: Tria
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I have tried everything and this actually works! But it is not for the faint of heart because it dose sting a little but so worth it I’ve just been using it on level four and have been using it for a little over 3 months and my hair has barely grown back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool discount
customer_reviews.text: The user of this item is satisfied, and said works as it described
customer_reviews.author: Rawand Tajuldeen Sahib

customer_reviews.title: Like I'll have to press several times or press and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this probably three times at most so far on any one area. I think it is substantially lessening the amount of dark hair in my armpits, bikini, & even on less-than-flattering facial hair. My only complaint is that the power button does not always seem to function right...Like I'll have to press several times or press and hold for the unit to do anything, making me unsure of the overall quality - It makes me feel like this could stop working at any time (& it cost WAY too much for that!)
customer_reviews.author: eurika23

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Best money I ever spent!!! Have to follow the directions for proper results but well worth the time and money!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Tocha

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work on specific skin type returned item
customer_reviews.text: It did not work on dark skinned people or brown skin people it had to be returned
customer_reviews.author: Betty Paul

product_meta.title: Tria Beauty Hair Removal Laser 4X for Women and Men
product_meta.description:
Color:WhitePowered by the same in-office Diode Laser Technology used by dermatologists, the Tria Hair Removal Laser 4X is the first and only at-home laser to remove unwanted hair at a fraction of the in-office treatment.

BRAND STORY
Tria Beauty is a global leader in beauty and skincare. Tria is the only available laser hair removal device cleared for home use.
